author: kiwibrowser
name: Kiwi Browser (Dev)
changeLog:
Version 116.0.5845.240
including the following changes since: 2023-08-16T10:43:07Z

Syncing with latest local repository

This version will replace your currently installed Kiwi Browser (com.kiwibrowser.browser).
If you have important data, make sure to backup them or save them before upgrading to this version.

This release was automatically generated from GitHub refs/heads/kiwi in run ID 6453943399.

Summary:
  - To install / update Kiwi Browser, use "com.kiwibrowser.browser-arm64-6453943399-github.apk".
  If it doesn't work, try again using "com.kiwibrowser.browser-arm64-6453943399-playstore.apk" (if it exists).

Detailed information about the different files:
  - ".map" files are files that developers can use to investigate crashes (ProGuard mapping files), these files are not needed to run the browser and are for developers only.
  - ".apk" files are packages that you have to install to use Kiwi Browser.

The filenames are in the form "[PACKAGE_NAME]-[ARCHITECTURE]-[BUILD_VERSION]-[SIGNATURE_TYPE].apk"

If you want to keep the Play Store version installed, and still try the GitHub edition then you can install the APKs starting with "com.kiwibrowser.browser.dev" (you will keep all your Play Store bookmarks, settings and passwords, and the GitHub edition will be installed separately).

Build version:
 - Everytime a change is introduced in Kiwi Browser, a new build version is generated.

Architecture:
  - "-arm64" is compatible with modern devices and offers the best performance.
  - "-arm" is compatible with almost all devices and uses less memory.
  - "-x86" and "-x64" builds are compatible with emulators and Intel compatible tablets.

Signature type:
  - On Android, applications have to be signed by a developer before they can be installed.

Kiwi has two types of builds:

Signed by the developer:
  - "-github.apk" are builds signed using the official developer key.
A signed build is a build that comes straight from the GitHub official repository and is always the most updated.

Play Certified by Google:
  - Once in a while, we send a "-github.apk" build to be reviewed and signed by Google.
Google reviews the application, checks that the application is not malicious, adds the "Google Play Certified" badge, signs the file and this becomes "-playstore.apk".

We then distribute "-playstore.apk" on Google Play, XDA-Developers, Samsung and other app stores.
 
This process takes some time and is partially manual so not all GitHub builds have a "-playstore.apk".

On Android, you can install an update to an application only if it was signed by the same developer as the version that you currently have installed:
  - You can install a "-github.apk" build on top of a "-github.apk" build, and a "-playstore.apk" build on top of a "-playstore.apk" build.
  - You cannot install a "-playstore.apk" build on top of a "-github.apk" build.

Essentially, if you downloaded Kiwi from an app store, you need to use the "-playstore.apk" files or uninstall the version of Kiwi you have and start using the "-github.apk" version.

author: JunkFood02
name: Seal
changeLog:
## What's Changed
### Added

**Subtitles**

* Convert subtitles to another format
* Select subtitle language in format selection

**Format selection**

* Display icons(video/audio) on `FormatItem`s
* Split video by chapters
* Select subtitle to download by language names/codes

**Custom commands**

* Create custom command tasks in the Running Tasks page
* Configure download directory separately for custom command tasks
* Select multiple command templates to export & remove

**Cookies**

* Add `CookiesQuickSettingsDialog` for refreshing & configuring cookies in configuration menu
* Add user agent header when downloading with cookies enabled

**Other New Features & UI Improvements**

* Show `PlainToolTip` when long-press on `PlaylistItem`
* Add monochrome theme
* Add proxy configuration for network connections
* Add translations in Swedish and Portuguese

### Fixed

* App crashes when being opened in the system share sheet
* Video not shown in YouTube playlist results
* Cookies cannot be disabled after clearing cookies
* Hide video only formats when save as audio enabled
* Parsing error with decimal value in width/height
* Audio codec preference not works as expected
* Could not fetch video info when `originalUrl` is null

### Changed

**Notable Changes**

* Upgrade target API level to 34 (Android 14)
* Preferred video format changed to two options: Legacy and Quality
* UI improvements to the configuration dialog

**Other Changes**

* Update `ColorScheme`s and components to reflect the new MD3 color roles
* Update youtubedl-android version, added pycryptodomex to the library
* Move Video formats to the bottom of the `FormatPage`
* Notifications now are enabled by default
* Minor UI improvements & changes

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/JunkFood02/Seal/compare/v1.9.2...v1.10.0

author: MonwF
name: CustoMIUIzer14
changeLog:
This build is for `A13+` only and `lsposed 1.9.1+` is required also. Get the last build for A12 from [link](https://github.com/MonwF/customiuizer/releases/tag/v23.08.26)

**You must backup settings from the customiuizer app before updating module and  restore settings later.**

refine the module with modern lsposed api
compat with new systemui
disable swipe to pa from hotseats
hide none data sim icon at statusbar
add open by default entry
tweak indicator and dock margin of homescreen
hide second space icon
hide battery percentage but display in control center

fix: long screenshot bug when format is set to png

----

这个版本开始只支持 A13+ 和 lsposed 1.9.1+。 从 [这里](https://github.com/MonwF/customiuizer/releases/tag/v23.08.26) 下载A12的版本

**请先备份配置，再升级，然后恢复配置**

适配 LSPosed modern api
初步适配新版本的systemui
设置dock右滑手势后，右滑时，不进入负一屏
隐藏非上网卡图标
隐藏隐身空间图标
增加 "默认打开“ 入口
桌面新增dock、指示器上下边距调整
隐藏电量百分比，只在下拉时显示
其他bug修复

author: Team-Cemiuiler

changeLog:
**我们更新了用户协议及隐私政策，请及时查看，您继续使用Cemiuiler即代表您同意我们的用户协议及隐私政策。**
用户协议：https://cemiuiler.sevtinge.cc/Protocol
隐私政策：https://cemiuiler.sevtinge.cc/Privacy

MIUI 12.5(125) / 12.5E(125) / 13.0(130) / 13.1(130) / 13.2(130) / 14.0(140)

149. 优化 DexKit 使用及hook逻辑；(@Sevtinge, @mu7220)
150. 优化 SeekBar精细度；(@MoralNorm, @mu7220, @Sevtinge)
151. 优化 依赖；(@nakixii)
152. 优化 日志输出；(@mu7220, @Sevtinge)
153. 优化 耗电；(@mu7220, @Sevtinge)
154. 优化 操作逻辑；(#355, @HChenX)
155. 优化 文本描述。(@Sevtinge, @mu7220)

### 注意事项：
1. 目前暂未适配 Android 14(U, 34)，**若您执意在 Android 14 上使用，请将 LSPosed 版本更新至 7017 及以上**；
2. 出现任何问题**请关闭禁用详细日志输出后携带日志提交给开发者**；
3. 以下Pull Requests审核待通过：#403。

author: Xposed-Modules-Repo
name: NoStorageRestrict
changeLog:
* Enabled Managed Mode on the DocumentsUI (make sure to apply the module to the Files/Documents app)
  * This change allows selecting /data and /obb folders on the Android folder (where as before they were hidden)
  
  ### Note 
   The signature has changed on this version so you'll have to uninstall the previous version before updating

author: test01wrk
name: MIUI Performance Saver
changeLog:
- 功能：Joyose 规则内容支持长按复制到剪贴板
- 功能：提示电量性能、Joyose 应用不存在或被冻结
- 修复：某些机型修改 Joyose 帧率功能失效
- 修复：暗黑模式下 Joyose 规则内容背景色适配

---

- Feature：Allow copy Joyose profile content to clipboard by long pressing
- Feature：Notify if PowerKeeper or Joyose app not working
- Fix：Remote FPS limit not working on some devices
- Fix: Joyose profile content background color in dark mode

author: ya0211

```kotlin
const val CURRENT_VERSION = 1
```

## What's Changed
* Fix installation of mounted virtual zip files in https://github.com/ya0211/MRepo/commit/19a5e2c1b0b3932b7699b27cf2b09f44a5118bb0 (#88)
* Add foreground service types for Android 14 by @lihenggui in https://github.com/ya0211/MRepo/pull/91

## Dependency Update
* Bump androidx.compose.material3:material3 from 1.2.0-alpha08 to 1.2.0-alpha09 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ya0211/MRepo/pull/79
* Bump androidxCompose from 1.6.0-alpha06 to 1.6.0-alpha07 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ya0211/MRepo/pull/80

* Bump androidx.activity:activity-compose from 1.8.0-rc01 to 1.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ya0211/MRepo/pull/82
* Bump protobuf from 3.24.3 to 3.24.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ya0211/MRepo/pull/83
* Bump androidx.navigation:navigation-compose from 2.7.3 to 2.7.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ya0211/MRepo/pull/84

* Bump androidx.compose.material:material from 1.5.2 to 1.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ya0211/MRepo/pull/86

author: Mahmud0808
name: Iconify
changeLog:
### Iconify v6.5.1 has arrived! It has the following new changes:

## Feature Changes:
- __Xposed Menu:__
    - Fix Xposed Menu not accessible in LSPosed beta (7010+)
    - Small fixes related to depth wallpaper
    - Update prebuilt overlays targeting android 14
    - Add 15 more battery styles
    - Add custom battery colors and margins
    - Add custom battery charging icon. Thanks to [SuperiorExtended](https://github.com/SuperiorExtended/android_frameworks_base/commit/ec4d8e9f0d80353eb859c5994fd1d5252b6ecfc3)
    - Fix battery icon color in landscape mode
    - Improve battery styles to work on more roms
    - Fix battery styles crashing on android 14

## App Changes:
- Add Min SDK and Target SDK in overlay manifest
- Add signature scheme v2 for overlays
- Add Polish language. Thanks to @SK00RUPA
- Update Chinese and Turkish translation. Thanks to @Cccc-owo and [@WINZORT](https://crowdin.com/profile/linuxthegoat)
- And many more improvements...

Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.

author: tiann
name: KernelSU
changeLog:
- [Kernel] Fixed security vulnerability.
- [Module] The GKI kernel supports automatic umount of modules to solve the problem of certain applications detecting module mount points.
- [Manager] Fixed the issue where the update log was too long causing the update dialog box to be abnormal.
- [Module] Adapt to the init process below Android 9.

author: sunilpaulmathew
name: De-Bloater
changeLog:
Experimentally included '/system/preload' to support list.
Exporting profiles now allows using custom names.
Searching apps now consider for both app and package names.
Replaced depreciated onActivityResult with ActivityResultLauncher
Added Japanese and Chinese (Simplified & Traditional - Hong Kong) translations.
Updated other translations.
Updated build tools and dependencies.
Miscellaneous changes.

author: MuntashirAkon

- Avoided fetching app list for other users if there's not enough permission

- Prevented the app from crashing when filename returned by SAF is null (empty)
- Skipped loading usage for uninstalled packages

author: AndroidAudioMods

changeLog:
**How to update:** Download and install <ins>BOTH</ins> files (App + Magisk module)

**Recommended way to import presets, kernels or VDCs:** Go to Settings -> Files -> Import <preset, kernel, VDC>

**Driver changelog:**
- Fixed ViPER DDC
- Added architecture info to debug data

**App changelog:**
- Enabled ViPER DDC
- Added binary architecture to driver status dialog
- Added settings entry to import presets, kernels and VDC files.
- Fixed #38

author: T8RIN
name: Image Toolbox (Resizer)
changeLog:
## New Features
* Improved UI for better accessibility.
* New fonts added:
   - DejaVu
   - BadScript
   - RuslanDisplay
* Two new Draw Brushes
   - Privacy Blur
   - Pixelation
* Added ability to draw arrows in DrawMode.
* Added canvas size extending mode resizing.
* Expanded Donation setting to be shown first 3 app launches, also replaced QIWI with Bitcoin and USDT wallets.
* Image Stitching feature created.
* Added background blur for canvas extending.
* New filters added:
   - Color Replacement
   - Color Removance
   - Pixelation
   - Enhanced Pixelation
   - Stroke Pixelation
   - Circle Pixelation
   - Enhanced Circle Pixelation
   - Diamond Pixelation
   - Enhanced Diamond Pixelation

## Bug Fixes
* UI fixes for sheets.
* Fixed issue #426 and #347.
* Fixed not showing loading dialog on image saving.
* Fixed lags in all places.
* Fixed Image Eraser.
* Fixed screen capture on Android 14+.
* Reduced lags while painting.


:D If you want to support app developement -> ```17Pk1RurnkJxLV9V7mc6Y7dLyHFb9rvQDq```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/T8RIN/ImageToolbox/compare/2.3.2...2.4.1
